item.title: Prana Vayus
item.description: An exploration of the five Prana Vayus, the winds of energy that influence every aspect of our physical and energetic being.

item.title: Introduction to yin yoga
item.description: Yin Yoga is a gentle, meditative practice focusing on deep stretching by holding poses for extended periods. It enhances flexibility and relieves stress, targeting the body's deep connective tissues.

item.title: What Is Yoga?
item.description: I’ve decided to pivot from writing about IT to exploring my passion for yoga, which I’ve practiced for nearly a decade. Unlike other sports, yoga has remained a constant in my life. Recently, I discovered Inner Dimension and began a 200-hour yoga teacher training course. I’ll be sharing insights and reflections from this journey. Yoga is more than just physical poses; it’s about harmonizing breath and movement to achieve mental clarity. It offers tools to manage inner turmoil and maintain peace. Join me as I delve deeper into the essence of yoga.
